BE it enacted by the King’s Most Excellent Majesty, by and with the advice and consent of the Sonate and the Houso of Representatives of Ceylon in this present Parliament assembled, and hy the muthority of the same, as follows:— 1, This Act may be cited as the Loan Board stoctie (Amendment) Act, No. 5 of 1952. 2.
